page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE ...
page.content: do maths until 10.40am when we go out to play. In the summer we play in the large field behind the school. In winter we play in the play-ground. we have hop-scotch grids printed out on the tarmac and a net-ball pitch. After play at 11.00am we go back into class for English until dinner-time which is 12.00noon. I go home for dinner those staying usually have a hot meal and a sweet. At 1.00pm school starts and lessons last until play-time at 2.30pm.We can buy crisps at 5p for a small packet.At 2.50pm the bell goes and we go back in side.We sometimes do P.E.using the equipment in the hall and do exercises. At 3.00pm its hometime. We have clubs after school but I normally go straight home to play on my computer or watch TV.
